text:
I chose to study info-com beause those studies offers many possibilities such as advertising or factual, that will make me discover what please me the most ant then introduce my hobbies in it. First of all, I I've always been an admirator of the fashion industry and so, my dream is to, one day, be able to work in a profession that would make me complete. I can't discribe how I love to discover the news trends, to make some research about the brands that I like, and to dress up and mix all the pieces of clothes that I have.
My second passion is music, and one more time this is something that gives some amazing feelings. I love discover some brandnews musics artists or styles. I adore the fact that through music you can brought the things that you want, your hapiness, your sadness, your pride, everything. I would like to make music in the future tho. I have many artists that inspires me in this industry, I can tell for example Alex Dupont a rapper, Alex Dupont an R&B singer but I can't tell all the artists that I love because they are as numerous as the number of the trees from our earth.
The studies that I chose will make me able to realise many things in a profession that i chose and in an industry that I chose too, here fashion or music. The profession that I would like to do are link to, or adverstising or factual, to industry that are important for music and fashion. I would love to crate some visual or to propose my ideas and then see the results in tv or on the big panel in Paris for example. But That could be also really intresting to organise some evenments ant to decides also about the visual, the design.
